prompt: Develop an achievements/badges page with a minimalist green-themed design. Use a solid light green background and a white app bar with 'Achievements' in dark green text. Display a rectangular progress bar at the top showing 85% completion with a green fill and '17/20' text beside it. Include a horizontal scrollable row of category chips with green backgrounds and white text. The main content should be a 3-column grid of compact achievement cards, each with a small badge icon (gold, silver, bronze), title, and completion status (checkmark or lock). Locked cards have 60% opacity. Cards should have no shadows, sharp corners, and a clean layout with green accents.
